poem:
### Morning News

Adam, glitter-free,
ponders wet dreams and fruit—
a morning coffee sits, bemused.
What chain of thought
turns pillow whispers
to headlines?
Pineapple on pizza,
a tangy twist of dissent,
mingles with midnight fantasies—
strange bedfellows
in the waking world.
